title: MR has informed certain groups he was willing to resign: Gammanipila
body_lines: Former Minister Udaya Gammanpila said Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa has informed certain groups including Buddhist monks and party leaders that he was ready to step down.
He told a news conference that some group who was using powers of the Prime Ministers unduly and was preventing him from stepping down.
Gammanpila said if they continued to do so, he would reveal the names of those persons.
He said the opposition had the support of 120 MPs on the no-confidence motion against the government.(Ajith Siriwaradana)
